dream_text: I was falling from a high building and woke up before hitting the ground.
I was late to an exam and couldn't find the classroom.
I missed my train.
I kept running but couldn't move fast enough.
I was drowning and couldn't breathe.
I felt trapped in a small room with no exit.
I was flying above cities, feeling free and joyful.
I broke out of a locked cage and saw the sky.
I was floating through clouds and laughing.
I escaped a closed tunnel into bright sunlight.
I was walking on water, feeling limitless.
I found an old house full of books and felt nostalgic.
I met my childhood friend again.
I visited my old school.
I smelled the same perfume from years ago.
I was back in my childhood home.
I was lost in a maze but calm and curious.
I couldn’t find my way out of a strange town.
I was walking through fog and didn’t know where I was going.
I opened a door but didn’t know what was behind it.
I was being chased and could not run fast enough.
I was lost in a dark forest.
I was chased by shadows.
I heard footsteps behind me but saw no one.
I was drowning in the ocean at night.
I overcame my fears and stood tall.
A giant storm destroyed my house but I rebuilt it.
I fell but got back up stronger.
I faced a monster but it vanished when I stopped running.
I finished a marathon after many obstacles.
I was at a party with friends.
I was flying through the clouds.
I met everyone I loved in one place.
I laughed until I cried.
I was surrounded by people who cared for me.
I found treasure in my garden.
I woke up in a strange place.
I discovered a secret passage.
I opened a box and it started glowing.
I was given an unexpected gift.
